remotes.name: Remote name
remotes.deleteConfirmBody: This will delete the remote and all buttons/signals.

remote.title: Remote
remote.learningChoiceBody: This remote already has buttons. How do you want to continue?
remote.learningChoiceAddHint: Keep existing buttons and learn new ones.
remote.learningChoiceResetHint: Remove existing buttons and start from scratch.
remote.gapUsHint: Auto when empty (can be inferred during learning).

button.title: Button
button.deleteConfirmBody: This will delete the button and its signals.

agents.pickerDescription: Choose an agent to execute this remote.
agents.pickerHint: Offline agents can be selected but cannot execute commands.
agents.remoteHint: Offline agents can be selected but cannot execute commands.
agents.configurationUrlHint: Optional link shown in Home Assistant for this agent.
agents.assignedRemotesEmpty: No remotes are assigned to this agent.
agents.pairingRequiresMqtt: Pairing is disabled until MQTT is configured.
agents.pairingMqttDisconnected: Pairing is disabled until MQTT is connected.
agents.pairingDisabledHint: Connect to MQTT in Settings before starting pairing.

settings.agentDescription: Control whether the Hub registers a local agent for IR hardware access.
settings.hubIsAgentHint: Disable this when the Hub should run without local IR hardware.
settings.mqttDescription: Configure the MQTT broker used for external agents.
settings.mqttHostHint: Hostname or IP address. Leave empty to disable MQTT.
settings.mqttPasswordHint: Leave empty to keep current stored password.
settings.mqttPasswordStoredHint: A password is currently stored encrypted in the database.
settings.mqttBaseTopicHint: Optional. Used by the MQTT broker to distinguish multiple hubs sharing one broker. Allowed: letters, numbers, _ and -.
settings.mqttMasterKeyMissing: SETTINGS_MASTER_KEY is missing. Storing MQTT passwords is blocked.
settings.learningDescription: Adjust how the app learns signals. These values are used as defaults in the learning wizard.
settings.learningPressTakesHint: How many times you press the button for one capture. More presses improve accuracy but take longer.
settings.learningTimeoutHint: How long to wait for a signal before giving up. Used for press and hold.
settings.learningHoldIdleHint: When learning a hold, the capture ends after this much quiet time between repeats. Increase if it ends too soon.
settings.learningRoundHint: Rounds tiny timing differences to reduce noise. Higher values smooth more but can reduce precision.
settings.learningMatchHint: How similar the presses must be to accept the signal. Higher is stricter.
settings.helpPublicBaseUrlBody: Use this if the UI is hosted under a sub-path (for example: /mqtt-ir-module/).
settings.helpApiKeyBody: If set, you need an API key to make changes in the UI.
settings.helpReverseProxyBody: Recommended: let your proxy add the API key for the UI. See reverse-proxy.md.
settings.homeassistantEnabledHint: Enable MQTT discovery publishing for Home Assistant (Hub mode only).
settings.hubIsAgentReadonlyHint: Read-only. Set via LOCAL_AGENT_ENABLED in environment variables.

wizard.title: Learning wizard
wizard.qualityAdvice: Quality is low. Consider recapturing this button.
wizard.takesHint: How many times you press the button for one capture. More presses improve accuracy but take longer.
wizard.timeoutHint: How long to wait for a signal before giving up. Used for press and hold.
wizard.learningActiveElsewhere: Learning is active for another remote ({{remote}}).
wizard.errorLearningActiveOther: Learning is active for another remote ({{remote}}). Stop it first.
wizard.noLearnCapableAgent: No agent is available that can learn IR signals.
wizard.assignAgentFirst: Select an assigned agent for this remote before learning.
wizard.assignedAgentMissing: The assigned agent is not registered.
wizard.assignedAgentCannotLearn: The assigned agent cannot learn IR signals.

errors.unauthorizedTitle: Write access requires an API key
errors.unauthorizedBody: Configure reverse proxy header injection or set PUBLIC_API_KEY (not recommended).
errors.timeoutBody: Press the button within the timeout and try again.
errors.captureReceiverBody: Check the receiver connection, device path, and permissions, then try again.
errors.captureSignalInvalidBody: Try again and keep the remote steady and pointed at the receiver.
errors.captureSignalInconsistentBody: Press the button consistently, reduce distance, or increase the number of takes.
errors.captureHoldIncompleteBody: Hold the button longer and keep it pressed until the capture finishes.
errors.conflictBody: The server reported a conflict. Try again or stop the current learning session.
errors.learningActiveBody: Learning is already active. Stop the current session and try again.
errors.signalExistsBody: This signal already exists. Choose re-learn or overwrite to replace it.
errors.sendWhileLearningBody: Stop learning before sending a signal.
errors.agentRequiredBody: Assign an agent to this remote to continue.
errors.noAgentsBody: Enable a local agent or connect an external agent to continue.
errors.agentOfflineBody: The selected agent is offline or unavailable. Choose another agent or bring it online.
errors.badRequestBody: Check your input and try again.
errors.settingsMissingBody: Change at least one setting before saving.
errors.settingsMasterKeyBody: SETTINGS_MASTER_KEY is missing. Configure it before storing a password.
errors.mqttPasswordDecryptFailedBody: Stored MQTT password cannot be decrypted with the current SETTINGS_MASTER_KEY.
errors.settingsCryptoMissingBody: Encryption dependency is missing on the backend. Install the cryptography package.
errors.signalMissingBody: Capture the required signal first, then try again.
errors.notFoundBody: The requested item could not be found.
errors.offlineBody: Check container / network and try again.
errors.genericBody: Please try again in a moment.

picker.searchPlaceholder: Search icons by name or mdi:...
picker.empty: No MDI icons match your search.
